name.en: The Swordsman Who Doles Out Victory
name.ja: <ruby>勝<rt>しょう</rt></ruby><ruby>敗<rt>はい</rt></ruby>を<ruby>分<rt>わ</rt></ruby>かつ<ruby>剣<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Buster Blader" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card's name becomes "Buster Blader". Then, you can add 1 "Polymerization" or "Miracle Secret Arts" from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, this card cannot attack.
